yānqiē eagerness

mùdi cemetery
mùdì cemetery

traditional: 墓志銘
mùzhìmíng epitaph

traditional: 償清
chángqīng to repay; to pay off a debt

débùchángshī (saying) the gains do not make up for the losses

qīngcháng to repay a debt in full; to redeem; to clear

wúcháng free; no charge; at no cost

bǔcháng compensate; make up
